title: IUSF protest march commences
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The protest march of the Inter University Students Federation (IUSF) commenced a short while ago today (24).
The students will be marching from Colombo Fort railway station.
Heavy traffic has been reported along Lotus road, Chidambaram Road and Wijewardena Mawatha.
Previously, Police closed roads near the Presidential Secretariat at Galle Face with roadblocks and iron barricades were seen installed in the area.
